p: Moringa oleifera leaf had no significant effects on the serum testosterone concentration in male mice and serum estradiol concentration in female mice (Tables 6 and 7, p > 0.05). Serum antioxidant indexes were measured, and the results showed that serum glutathione peroxidase (GSH‐PX) and superoxide dismutase (SOD) in male or female mice were unchanged ( p > 0.05). But male and female mice fed with MOL diets had lower serum malondialdehyde (MDA) than control mice (Tables 6 and 7), which indicated that MOL could, in some extent, play an anti‐oxidative role in mice.
